post.body: Woohoo for 0 blances on credit cards! Working on paying mine off too so can relate to the *another one down" feeling. WtG!!
Fingers and paws crossed over here.
Yeah, but Terry Gross is weird anyway about what seems to light her up. And yet I continue to listen more nights than not.
Wishing you a therapeutic night's sleep. Sending NyQuil vibes.
I get a cold maybe once a year and I'm overdue. This one even tagged my mom and she NEVER gets sick.
That's why NyQuil is on my shopping list. I'm pretty sure it's just a matter of time before this one nails me.
He swears by Zpacks, for whatever that might be worth. Me, I'm a DayQuil/NyQuil gal, myself.
Sounds like the version of the cold my boss has. Not sick enough to miss work but sick enough to wish you weren't there.
Can't miss a Titans game - on TV. Have you got slick streets where you are?
Lucky so far. It's hitting all around me -- co-workers, friends, family. I'll probably get it just in time for Christmas.
Guilty. Not "close to" -- right smack in. :)
The only NyQuil I have is on my shopping list. That cold's going around at work. Hope you feel better soon.
All OK here. Radar is now orange & yellow; the red & purple leading edge blew through fast.
All OK here. Radar is now orange & ylw; the red & purpl
Great photos! Happy Day After Christmas to all of you!
And Merry Christmas to you and yours, too!
Would usually make beeline from work to nearby breakfast buffet but feeling puny. Bacon, milk gravy, etc., ill-advised at this time. Nxt wk.
from the What Was I Thinking dept, I ate like trash compactor today. Must now call upon my henchmen, Pepto and Bismol.
Just shopped for an hour in a Super Walmart. It was WAY too quiet for 9 days before Christmas. Easy shopping but unsettling, economy-wise.
"Doctors have performed a historic face plant." He meant "face TRANSplant". Still LOL.
Disclaimer: I'm a huge Charlie Gibson fan but he did a great fluff. See next tweet...
Plans for tonight just got cx'd. Suddenly have 3 open hrs to go shopping.
Tired of same short hairstyle for past 200 yrs. Been stalwart so far in letting it grow but GOD it's so raggedy-looking right now.
Changing all the air filters in the house at 1:10AM. Life in the fast lane.
Just watched "In the Bedroom" (Sissy Spacek, others). Last 30 minutes = most intense half-hour of film I've seen in a LONG time. Wow.
Warning over, now just t'storms. Skywarn net closed, rptr back open to normal traffic. Gotta love a NWS net that closes w/no damage rpts.
(oops) rptd on other side of town.
Leading edge moved in & thru quickly. Warning extended a few mins. Qtr-in hail rp
Oops, spoke too soon. T.storm warning, wind gusts over 60mph due in 10 mins, radar showing rotation echo moving this way. Skywarn net open.
Line of severe t'storms will be here any minute. No warnings so far but's clear on the radar and the wind's starting to really get going.
Rather taken aback to realize, after shopping for 2 hoursan that apparently no one sells breadboxes you can walk in and buy anymore.
Cleaning out an old purse to go to Goodwill. Found brand new compact, barely used MP3 player, my cell phone manual, and FTW, two $20 bills!
Determined to get at least one big box of stuff put together and taken to Goodwill this weekend. So why am I just sitting here?
One second I had 2 sweet purring cats curled up on me, next second, yowling hissing mayhem. Cats apparently have personal space too.
OMG, so very very full. Only 6pm?? Must be nearly bedtime. Turkey coma imminent.
Fruit salad in frzr, oyster dressing in fridge awaiting turkey tmrw. Next, deviled eggs. Making good time in kitchen; glad I started early!
About to have "It's A Wonderful Life" on the kitchen TV (non-cable) while I'm cooking. Gather ye analog TV while ye may.
Phone just rang, caller ID said it was a local hospital. Scared so bad. Who? What? Turned out to be a wrong number.
Just finished wrapping all my gifts but 3 (in car - raining). Few hours sleep then tmrw = deviled eggs, oyster dressing, frozen fruit salad.
Crap - sugar crash right in the middle of shopping. Momentarily sidelined, munching tabs to bring it up, ten pressing onward.
